options.name: Default

name: Large Signature hair bow  Regular stripes and polka dots
description:
At Sugar Apple, I make European Bows. My signature bows are specially attached to French barrettes, they are available in all solid colours, stripes and also polka dots. We make also a boutique bows attached to alligator clips.  
I make every hair bow  to stay in place. They are hand-tied for sturdy hold and durability.

 The edges are sealed to prevent fraying.

 You can find our hair bows in fine boutiques.

 Enjoy browsing through Sugar Apple. 

For wholesale prices please send me and email!!!!
